name: amp-for-bandcamp
description: Amplifies Bandcamp functionality with playback controls and UI improvements
author: Rafal Enden

scripts.build: npm run build:zip && npm run build:safari
scripts.build:zip: zip -r dist/amp-for-bandcamp.zip manifest.json src/ vendor/ icons/
scripts.build:safari: xcodebuild -project 'safari/Amp for Bandcamp.xcodeproj' -scheme 'Amp for Bandcamp (macOS)' -configuration Release -derivedDataPath dist/safari clean build
